/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is teeming with life, with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the street, their facades a testament to the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
